Body: Description: Good day, We've observed that our Netwrix instance consistently goes down for approximately 20 minutes each night between 1:30 AM and 2:00 AM. Additionally, as of 1:30 AM this morning (SA time), the instance has been down and has not recovered. We are currently unable to access the platform via its URL: (https://2jn87cd.hosted.endpointprotector.com/). Could you please investigate this issue urgently? Best regards,
